attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister and his Government to listen to those vocal people who spend their days being disgusted about the media's treatment of the 'People's Princess', whilst voraciously consuming everything in print about her, to henceforth ban all articles and pictures about her.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
